name: bad guy
lyrics:
[ti:bad guy]
[ar:Billie Eilish]
[al:WHEN WE ALL FALL ASLEEP, WHERE DO WE GO?]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]bad guy - Billie Eilish (腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权)
[00:04.81]Lyrics by：Billie Eilish O'Connell/Finneas O'Connell
[00:09.62]Composed by：Billie Eilish O'Connell/Finneas O'Connell
[00:14.43]White shirt now red my bloody nose (血流不止的鼻子染红了我的白衬衫)
[00:17.92]Sleepin' you're on your tippy toes (你会踮着脚尖趁我安睡时)
[00:21.43]Creepin' around like no one knows (偷偷潜到我的身边 仿佛无人察觉)
[00:24.96]Think you're so criminal (感觉你真是十恶不赦的罪人)
[00:28.55]Bruises on both my knees for you (因为你 我双膝满是淤痕)
[00:32.12]Don't say thank you or please (不必再说感谢或是请求的话语)
[00:35.07]I do what I want when I'm wanting to (只要我愿意 我定会不顾一切)
[00:39.35]My soul so cynical (我的灵魂 如此的愤世嫉俗)
[00:42.15]So you're a tough guy (所以你一定得是个硬汉)
[00:43.72]Like it really rough guy (敢作敢当的男人)
[00:45.49]Just can't get enough guy (永远无法心满意足)
[00:47.23]Chest always so puffed guy (激情澎湃的那种人)
[00:49.53]I'm that bad type (而我算是那种坏人吧)
[00:50.82]Make your mama sad type (会让你的妈妈失望难过)
[00:52.49]Make your girlfriend mad tight (会让你的女朋友勃然大怒)
[00:54.36]Might seduce your dad type (会勾引你爸爸的那种坏人)
[00:56.68]I'm the bad guy duh (我就是个坏人)
[01:07.33]I'm the bad guy (我就是个坏人)
[01:14.86]I like it when you take control (我喜欢你掌握一切的模样)
[01:18.36]Even if you know that you don't (即使你知道你已屈于下风)
[01:21.84]Own me I'll let you play the role (拥有我 我会让你如愿以偿)
[01:25.34]I'll be your animal (我会做你的爱宠)
[01:29.11]My mommy likes to sing along with me (我妈妈喜欢跟我一起唱歌)
[01:33.74]But she won't sing this song (但这首歌她绝不会唱)
[01:36.13]If she reads all the lyrics (如果她看了这首歌的歌词)
[01:39.11]She'll pity the men I know (她肯定会同情这个男人 我知道)
[01:42.63]So you're a tough guy (所以你一定得是个硬汉)
[01:44.15]Like it really rough guy (敢作敢当的男人)
[01:45.79]Just can't get enough guy (永远无法心满意足)
[01:47.68]Chest always so puffed guy (激情澎湃的那种人)
[01:49.92]I'm that bad type (而我算是那种坏人吧)
[01:51.14]Make your mama sad type (会让你的妈妈失望难过)
[01:52.89]Make your girlfriend mad tight (会让你的女朋友勃然大怒)
[01:54.78]Might seduce your dad type (会勾引你爸爸的那种坏人)
[01:57.12]I'm the bad guy duh (我就是个坏人)
[02:08.05]I'm the bad guy duh (我就是个坏人)
[02:20.90]I'm only good at bein' bad bad (我唯一擅长的就是使坏)
[02:39.69]I like when you get mad (我喜欢你恼羞成怒的模样)
[02:43.77]I guess I'm pretty glad that you're alone (我想你孤身一人 我会暗自偷笑)
[02:47.65]You said she's scared of me (你说她怕我)
[02:49.81]I mean I don't see what she sees (我是说我可不理解她的想法)
[02:52.17]But maybe it's 'cause I'm wearing your cologne (但或许是因为我喷着你的古龙水吧)
[02:57.88]I'm a bad guy (我就是个坏人)
[03:05.73]I'm a bad guy (我就是个坏人)
[03:07.93]Bad guy bad guy (坏人 坏人)
[03:09.79]I'm a bad (我就是个坏人)
